explanations.machine learning: The paper uses machine learning techniques like partial least-squares regression (PLSR) and support vector machine regression (SVMR) for soil pH estimation.
explanations.supervised learning: The methods used (PLSR and SVMR) are supervised learning techniques as they involve training models on labeled data.
explanations.regression: The study employs regression techniques (PLSR and SVMR) to predict soil pH values from sensor data.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper specifically mentions the use of support vector machine regression (SVMR) for soil pH estimation.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is used in the paper for regression tasks.
